@graph.name: Beluga Lentil Stuffed Sweet Potatoes - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: These Lentil Stuffed Sweet Potatoes have beluga lentils cooked w/ chipotle peppers, served with mexican toppings. Gluten-free, Soy-free Vegan Recipe

@graph.name: Beluga Lentil Stuffed Sweet Potatoes
@graph.description: These Lentil Stuffed Sweet Potatoes have beluga lentils cooked w/ chipotle peppers, served with mexican toppings. Gluten-free, Soy-free Vegan Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup dry beluga lentils/caviar black lentils (picked through and washed or other brown lentils)
3/4 cup water (or more water depending on the lentils used)
1 to 2  chipotle chili in adobo sauce (use less for less spice)
1/2 cup corn (frozen or fresh or other other veggies)
guacamole (vegan sour cream/mayo/cashew cream, cilantro, lemon juice for garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F / 200ºc. Poke holes in the sweet potatoes and bake for 50 minutes to an hour until tender. Poke a few more holes mid way through baking.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F / 200ºc. Poke holes in the sweet potatoes and bake for 50 minutes to an hour until tender. Poke a few more holes mid way through baking.

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and drain the lentils. Add to a pan with 3/4 cup water and bring to a boil at medium heat. 4-5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Wash and drain the lentils. Add to a pan with 3/4 cup water and bring to a boil at medium heat. 4-5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Lower the heat to low-medium and cook partially covered for 15 minutes. Add more water if the lentils begin to stick. Adjust water according to lentils used.
recipeInstructions.name: Lower the heat to low-medium and cook partially covered for 15 minutes. Add more water if the lentils begin to stick. Adjust water according to lentils used.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the salt, spices, chopped chipotle pepper and corn to the lentils. Mix well and cook for 5 minutes or until the lentils are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the salt, spices, chopped chipotle pepper and corn to the lentils. Mix well and cook for 5 minutes or until the lentils are tender.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove sweet potatoes from the oven, cool slightly. Slice the baked sweet potatoes. Load them up with the lentil mixture. Add a dollop of guacamole, vegan sour cream or cashew cream, chopped cilantro, lemon juice. use any other toppings like salsa, pickled jalapenos etc.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove sweet potatoes from the oven, cool slightly. Slice the baked sweet potatoes. Load them up with the lentil mixture. Add a dollop of guacamole, vegan sour cream or cashew cream, chopped cilantro, lemon juice. use any other toppings like salsa, pickled jalapenos etc.
